# References

```{r references}
vroom::vroom('data/references.csv') %>%
  dplyr::filter(display == T) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(when = if_else(is.na(when_end), 
                        glue("{when_start}"), 
                        glue("{when_start} - {when_end}"))) %>%
  vitae::detailed_entries(what = with, when, with = what, where, why)
```
